commit 6317f932fd574b630840363d9c10325b39e7fa00
Author: Todd Lipcon <todd@cloudera.com>
Date:   Tue Sep 4 18:24:11 2012 -0700

    CLOUDERA-BUILD. Upgrade Jetty to 6.1.26.cloudera.2.
    
    This version of Jetty has been found to be much more
    reliable in the context of MapReduce, so should be used
    in HBase as well.
    
    The source for this Jetty release can be found at
    https://github.com/cloudera/jetty-hadoop-fix and corresponds to
    commit 51042f4a6cd36fe90be7c0f0d208dca5397b527a in that repository.
    
    Author: Todd Lipcon
    Ref: CDH-7767
